sectionOne.title: Information Systems Engineering
sectionOne.description: We train IT specialists and help people master technology and digital skills.

subSectionOne.descriptionOne: Information Systems Engineering is an interdisciplinary field that combines disciplines such as mathematics, business, and computer science. Information systems engineers design, develop, test, and maintain systems used primarily for data. Information systems can take various forms, including geographic information systems, meteorological image processing, or communication networks.
subSectionOne.descriptionTwo: Information systems engineers work in both the public and private sectors, including defense agencies, medical enterprises, or financial corporations.

cardOne.title: fields
cardOne.description: The Faculty of Information Systems Engineering combines 6 fields of information technology

cardTwo.title: years
cardTwo.description: The Faculty of Information Systems Engineering combines 8 fields of information technology

subSectionThree.title: Creative approach to studying IT innovations
subSectionThree.description: The modern program and methodology of teaching information technology focuses on the effective mastering of materials by students

sectionThree.title: Teachers
sectionThree.description: The scientific council and course teachers are outstanding Russian scientists, doctors, and candidates of sciences known worldwide. Practicing specialists in preventive, integrative, and anti-aging medicine.
sectionThree.descriptionTwo: Highly qualified mentors in the field of IT

sectionFour.title: We offer students
sectionFour.descriptionOne: Curricula are updated based on student surveys
sectionFour.descriptionTwo: A mentor accompanies the student at all stages of learning
sectionFour.descriptionThree: We provide all conditions for implementing your own startup project
sectionFour.descriptionFour: Students can intern at various IT companies around the world

sectionFive.title: Our Directions
sectionFive.description: The universal training program covers many areas of information technology, allowing students to choose their niche

courses.title: Graduate Programs
courses.description: The universal training program covers many areas of information technology, allowing students to choose their niche

sectionOne.title: Information Systems Design
sectionOne.description: A universal program covering many areas of IT

sectionTwo.title: About the Direction
sectionTwo.description: Information Systems Engineering is an interdisciplinary field that combines disciplines such as mathematics, business, and computer science. Information systems engineers design, develop, test, and maintain systems used primarily for data. Information systems can take various forms, including geographic information systems, meteorological image processing, or communication networks. Information systems engineers work in both the public and private sectors, including defense agencies, medical enterprises, or financial corporations.

one.title: For those who want to understand how complex IT systems work
one.description: You will learn the principles of designing, analyzing, and optimizing architecture. This will help you develop reliable systems, understand their structure, and comprehend the interaction of various components.

two.title: For those who want to create reliable solutions
two.description: You will learn to develop systems that process large amounts of data, withstand loads, and adapt to changes. This will be useful for creating complex and resilient IT infrastructures.

three.title: For those who want to enhance competitiveness
three.description: Knowledge in designing information systems is in demand across various fields. It will open up more career opportunities, allow you to apply for high-level positions, and broaden your development options.

one.title: Basics of programming and mathematics
one.description: At the start, you will master key programming languages, the basics of algorithms, computational mathematics, and physics. This will create a solid foundation for further learning.

two.title: System development and administration
two.description: You will study databases, computer networks, object-oriented programming, and working with web technologies. You will master the design and support of information systems.

three.title: Data analysis and machine learning
three.description: You will learn to work with Data Science, system modeling, cybersecurity, and artificial intelligence. This will help create intelligent and secure solutions.

four.title: Project management and practical development
four.description: You will gain skills in IT project management, software testing, and legal regulation in IT. During internships and the final project, you will consolidate your knowledge in practice.

sectionOne.title: Artificial Intelligence
sectionOne.description: A program that opens the world of artificial intelligence

sectionTwo.title: About the Direction
sectionTwo.description: Artificial Intelligence Engineering is an interdisciplinary field that combines mathematics, computer science, data analysis, and software development. Specialists in this field design, develop, optimize, and implement intelligent systems. The program covers advanced technologies such as machine learning, natural language processing, computer vision, robotics, and reinforcement learning. AI engineers work in various industries in both the public and private sectors, including healthcare, finance, industrial automation, and cybersecurity.

banner.title: Our Department Staff
banner.description: Our specialists are experienced professionals who know their job well. Their knowledge and skills help solve tasks of any complexity, and their drive for development makes our team one of the best.
